review: My wife and I finally decided to ditch cable/satellite since TV isn't really a necessity and I was tired of paying for garbage I didn't watch or care about. So far the Fire Stick has allowed us to download all the apps we've wanted so we can watch movies, listen to music, or play some games when we have some time.I was able to install the Fire Sticks to my TVs with ease and supply them power and still keep them hidden behind the screen so you don't see any ugly cables. I really like the Fire TV app that allows me to control the Fire Stick when my daughter decides to play with the remote and lose it. I'm able to control both my Fire Sticks from the app so I don't have to be concerned about which remote goes with which TV.
author: Louis Fleming
